lead_paragraph: So many wildfires are burning across the West that the National Interagency Fire Center announced that active-duty military troops will help.

headline.main: With Wildfires Spreading, 200 From Military Will Join Fight
headline.print_headline: With Wildfires Spreading, 200 From Military Will Join Fight

snippet: So many wildfires are burning across the West that the National Interagency Fire Center announced that active-duty military troops will help.
